alert.note: Alert for Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 7:21PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Ziebach County through 745 PM MDT... At 721 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8, or 7 miles southeast of Lantry. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Eagle Butte and Intersection of Highway 63 and BIA Road 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
